author: Al Moubayed, Samer and Beskow, Jonas and Bollepalli, Bajibabu and Hussen-Abdelaziz, Ahmed and Johansson, Martin and Koutsombogera, Maria and Lopes, Jos{\'e} David and Novikova, Jekaterina and Oertel, Catharine and Skantze, Gabriel and others
title: Tutoring Robots: Multiparty multimodal social dialogue with an embodied tutor
